charges.charge_description: 18:1542.F FALSE STATEMENT IN APPLICATION/USE OF PASSPORT : On or about [3/10/00] in Albany county, NDNY, deft did knowingly and willfully make false statements in an application for a US passport with the intent to induce and secure the issuance of a passport under the authority of the US for his own use or the use of another. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby sentenced to Probation for a term of 5 years; $1,000 fine and $100 special assessment due immediately
